title: Crest of the Blood Moon
description: LOOKING FOR REVIEWERS:Inside a castle tower high in the mountains Genevieve is being held against her will. Can she escape her gilded cage and find the answers she seeks?As Genevieve's birthday nears, time is running out. Who can she trust? Peter? Dahlia?Or maybe a dark stranger Laszlo is holding in the dungeon?Mistakes are made... The race is on to reach Alaska. To gather the Adlet Wolves and find William.Is Genevieve's and William's love enough to save them? Save their friends? Laszlo is close and on the night of the Blood Moon plans are made for the All Hallow's Eve Ball... The Ceremony. The Sacrifice. When the blood moon crests will Genevieve die?
author: Robin P. Waldrop
